parts.text: {"word":"supposedly","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"たぶん、おそらく、～ということになっている、伝えられるところでは","english_definition":"according to what is generally believed but not known for sure; allegedly.","examples":[{"sentence":"The restaurant is supposedly very good.","translation":"そのレストランは評判ではとても良いらしい。"},{"sentence":"Supposedly, he's quit his job.","translation":"伝えられるところによると、彼は仕事を辞めたらしい。"},{"sentence":"The treasure is supposedly buried somewhere on the island.","translation":"その宝は、おそらく島のどこかに埋められていることになっている。"},{"sentence":"Supposedly, this medicine can cure the disease.","translation":"伝えられるところでは、この薬でその病気が治るらしい。"}],"collocations":["supposedly true (たぶん本当)","supposedly haunted (幽霊が出ると言われている)","supposedly a secret (秘密ということになっている)"],"synonyms":["allegedly","reportedly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","apparently","seemingly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ost y","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly","ostensively","ostensibly",],"antonyms":["certainly","definitely","undoubtedly","assuredly"],"etymology":{"value":"From \"supposed\" + \"-ly\".","priority":"2"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/səˈpoʊzɪdli/","syllables":"sup-pos-ed-ly"},"inflection":{"notes":"Adverbs do not inflect."},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Supposedly' indicates that something is believed or reported to be true, but the speaker is not sure if it is actually true. It introduces an element of doubt or skepticism. It is often used when relaying information from a secondary source or when the speaker does not have firsthand knowledge.","priority":"3"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"*I supposedly went to the store.*","correct":"*I was supposedly going to the store.*","note":"'Supposedly' doesn't describe the speaker's actions, but rather the expectation or belief about an action. Use it with a form of 'be' + 'going to' or a similar construction to indicate a plan or expectation attributed to others."},{"incorrect":"*He is supposedly the best doctor, but I don't believe it.*","correct":"*He is supposedly the best doctor, but I doubt it.*","note":"'Doubt' is a stronger word than 'don't believe' and fits better with the nuance of 'supposedly,' which already implies some uncertainty."}],"priority":"2"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["suppose","supposition","suppositional"],"phrases":["I suppose","as it is supposed to be"],"priority":"2"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively common, but not among the most frequent adverbs.","priority":"1"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"The word 'supposedly' is used to show that something is said to be true, but you are not sure if it really is true. It's like saying 'people say that...' or 'it is believed that...' but you might not believe it yourself. It's a useful word when you want to share information without fully endorsing it or taking responsibility for its accuracy."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The movie is supposedly based on a true story.","translation":"その映画は、伝えられるところでは実話に基づいているらしい。","type":"general","meaning_category":"general"},{"sentence":"He's supposedly a millionaire, but he lives very modestly.","translation":"彼は億万長者ということになっているが、とても質素な暮らしをしている。","type":"contrast","meaning_category":"contrast"},{"sentence":"Supposedly, if you make a wish at the fountain, it will come true.","translation":"言い伝えによると、その噴水で願い事をすると叶うらしい。","type":"belief/rumor","meaning_category":"belief/rumor"}]}
